```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(broom)
library(modelr)
```

```{r}
atp <- read_csv(here::here("esselt21/tennis_module/data_repo/new_atp.csv"))

wta <- read_csv(here::here("esselt21/tennis_module/module_213/wta.csv"))
```

```{r}
library(broom)
# regression test to see difference
model_atp <- lm(WinPercentage ~ Surface:Matches + EloRank + ReturnPointsWonPercentage + AcesPerDoubleFault,
            data = atp)
summary(model_atp)
aug_atp <-
  augment(model_atp)

model_wta <- lm(WinPercentage ~ Surface + EloRank + ReturnPWP + Matches*Surface + AcesPDF,
            data = wta)
summary(model_wta)
aug_wta <-
  augment(model_wta)
```

```{r}
plot(model_wta)
```

```{r}
# plotting regression model for both ATP and WTA
aug_atp |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Matches,
             y = .fitted,
             colour = Surface)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = TRUE,
              aes(fill = Surface),
              linewidth = 1.25,
              alpha = 0.2) +
  geom_jitter(data = atp,
             aes(x = Matches,
                 y = WinPercentage),
             alpha = 0.4) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(y = 'Win Percentage',
       x = 'Number of Matches',
       title = 'Predictions vs. Actual Values of Win Percentages',
       caption = 'ATP') +
  facet_wrap(~Surface,
             scales = "free_x") +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
        panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", 
                                    fill = NA, 
                                    size = 1), 
        strip.background = element_rect(color = "black", 
                                        fill = "gray90",
                                        size = 1),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 15),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 20,
                                    face = 'bold'))

aug_wta |>
  ggplot(aes(x = Matches,
             y = .fitted,
             colour = Surface)) +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm",
              se = TRUE,
              aes(fill = Surface),
              linewidth = 1.25,
              alpha = 0.4) +
  geom_jitter(data = wta,
             aes(x = Matches,
                 y = WinPercentage),
             alpha = 0.4) +
  theme_minimal() +
  facet_grid(~Surface,
             scales = "free_x") +
  labs(y = 'Win Percentage',
       x = 'Number of Matches',
       title = 'Predictions vs. Actual Values of Win Percentages',
       caption = 'WTA') +
  theme(plot.background = element_rect(fill = "white"),
        panel.border = element_rect(color = "black", 
                                    fill = NA, 
                                    size = 1), 
        strip.background = element_rect(color = "black", 
                                        fill = "gray90",
                                        size = 1),
        strip.text = element_text(size = 15),
        plot.caption = element_text(size = 20,
                                    face = 'bold'),
        plot.title = element_text(size = 20))
```
